name: Stone Golem
description: The Stone Golem is a towering figure made from solid rock, crafted to serve as a guardian. Its immense strength, nearly impervious exterior, and lack of creativity characterize its presence.
memorable: Its ability to slow enemies and its immunity to non-magical attacks make it a formidable foe.
goals: To guard ancient sites, treasures, or fulfill its programmed duties without question.
relations: Often found alongside constructs or in places of great importance like temples and tombs.
environment: Ancient temples, tombs, or places laden with treasure.
strengths: Immune to non-magical damage, poison, and psychic damage; advantages against spells.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma makes it vulnerable to certain mental effects.
attacks: Three powerful Slam melee attacks, each capable of dealing substantial bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Slow ability disrupts enemy actions, significantly hindering their combat effectiveness.
skills: Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to its construct nature.
additional_information: Magic Resistance provides advantage on saving throws against magical effects.
Immutable Form makes it immune to alterations of its physical form.
Can rearrange its stone body for tactical advantages.
Slam attacks are considered magical, bypassing non-magical defenses.
Condition immunities include charmed, exhaustion, and frightened.
test_queries: construct that slows enemies in combat
durable stone creature with magical attacks
